name: Koten Tsumego Shuu: Shijin no Maki
overview: It's the era of the Second Han Dynasty, and China is being overrun by powerful warlords. A struggle for power among the court families has spawned a time known as the Three Kingdoms, and it's up to you (as the current ruler) to restore peace to your troubled country. Koten Tsumego Shuu - Shijin no Maki (Also known as Shikami no Maki or Koten Tsugoshuu: Shijin no Kan) is a go game in which the player to gain territories have to play go games, and defeat the opponents that way. Depending of the move the game will end, if the move is the right one the match will continue.
